DOC.brief_summary: We investigated whether treatment of central sleep apnea-hypopnea with bilevel positive airway pressure (BiPAP) in patients with idiopathic dilated cardiomyopathy (IDCM) would improve LV function.
DOC.brief_title: BiPAP for Cardiomyopathy With Central Sleep Apnea
DOC.criteria: Idiopathic dilated cardiomyopathy a history of alcohol abuse, diabetes mellitus, endocrine disorders, hypertension, obstructive sleep apnea syndrome, and chronic obstructive pulmonary disease
